title: #302: The Hunt for a Serial Killer, Rapist, Paedophile, Burglar - Part 7
description:
We resume our coverage of serial perpetrator RR.  Jim and Laura analyze the attacks of Patty Elaine Higgins, Mary Louise Cannon, Whitney Bennett, Joyce Lucille Nelson and Sophie Dickman. Lisa asks about what it was like when Jim and Laura were in law enforcement and whether there was a time when a serial offender was operating in their own backyard….and Laura shares a very important and harrowing personal experience.

#victimsmatter
